page.title: 07FACTORIES
page.content: There are two main factories in Dalston, one being Nestle's and the other being the Cotton Wool Mill. The main difference is the number of employees. Nestle's employs around 300 while the Mill employs 42. The Cotton Wool Mill produces different sorts of cotton wool. Nestle's produces milk powder for middle eastern countries like Saudi Arabia, Iran and Israel. There has been a major decline in employment since the early nineteenth century. Figures released then showed that there were eight hundred and eighty people employed in Dalston. But there was a lot more factories like corn mills and ironmongers. There are a few little companies at Buckabank. One is Norflex, a land drainage company, and one of the others is The Cookhouse, a catering company.
